newsitem.title: USA: Ross Systems says Tonen increases contract.
newsitem.headline: Ross Systems says Tonen increases contract.

text.p: Ross Systems Inc said Friday that Tonen Systems renewed its yearly contract to license and distribute Ross's Renaissance CS product line.
The aggregate contract is potentially worth $13.5 million, Ross said.
Renaissance CS is Ross's client server applications system.
Tonen Systems, an engineering services company, has more than 125 people committed to the success of Renaissance CS in Japan and expects that number to grow to more than 150 by year end, Ross said.
Ross Systems said it expects to recognize this latest commitment as revenue in its summer quarter, commencing July 1.
